Dialogue.Page: A distant world, with a single ruin visible on the surface.
Hypothesis: There is more to this world than meets the eye.
A distant world, with a single ruin visible on the surface.
Hypothesis: There is more to this world than meets the eye.
My Hearthian friend has informed me that this world houses a Nomai-created simulated reality which offers immortality.
While the Nomai who created it abandoned it, wishing never to be trapped in a world without the thrill of exploration, I have appropriated some of their schematics.
Even though they wished not to pursue the technology further, this advanced projection technology may still have its merits.
